org.switchyard.component.common.composer

Interface RegexContextMapper<D extends BindingData>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - the type of binding data
    All Superinterfaces:
    ContextMapper<D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRegexContextMapper, CamelContextMapper, HttpContextMapper, IndexedRecordContextMapper, JMSContextMapper, MappedRecordContextMapper, RESTEasyContextMapper, SOAPContextMapper, StreamableRecordContextMapper

    public interface RegexContextMapper<D extends BindingData>
extends ContextMapper<D>
    Maps context properties from and to a source or target object, with the ability to selectively choose which properties with regex expressions.
    Author:
    David Ward <dward@jboss.org> © 2012 Red Hat Inc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean matches(QName qname)
      Decides if the specified qualified name passes the collective regex expressions.

      Sets a comma-separated list of regex property excludes.

      Sets a comma-separated list of regex property namespace includes.
